categories: Category:Star Wars Adventures: Ghosts of Vader's Castle

nodes.text: Star Wars Adventures: Ghosts of Vader's Castle 2

Star Wars Adventures: Ghosts of Vader's Castle 2 is the upcoming second issue of the canon comic book miniseries Star Wars Adventures: Ghosts of Vader's Castle. It will be written by Cavan Scott, illustrated by Francesco Francavilla and Megan Levens, and is scheduled to be published by IDW Publishing on September 29, 2021.
The epic five week event miniseries Star Wars Adventures: Ghosts of Vader's Castle continues!

In issue #2, Lina searches for the now missing Milo and Crater and runs into... Jaxxon! He reveals that he, too, has been having nightmares, but of vicious Wookiees bigger than mountains! It seems the GHOSTS OF VADER'S CASTLE are haunting everyone’s dreams…
